hudson.plugins.analysis.core

Class FilesParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenkins.MasterToSlaveFileCallable<ParserResult>
      • hudson.plugins.analysis.core.FilesParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    hudson.FilePath.FileCallable<ParserResult>, Serializable, org.jenkinsci.remoting.RoleSensitive

    public class FilesParser
extends jenkins.MasterToSlaveFileCallable<ParserResult>
    Parses files that match the specified pattern and creates a corresponding ParserResult with a collection of annotations.
    Author:
    Ulli Hafner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • FilesParser

        public FilesParser(String pluginId,
                   AnnotationParser parser,
                   String moduleName)
        Creates a new instance of FilesParser. Since no file pattern is given, this parser assumes that it is invoked on a file rather than on a directory.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the ID of the plug-in that uses this parser
        parser - the parser to apply on the found files
        moduleName - the name of the module to use for all files

      • FilesParser

        public FilesParser(String pluginId,
                   String filePattern,
                   AnnotationParser parser,
                   String moduleName)
        Creates a new instance of FilesParser.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the ID of the plug-in that uses this parser
        filePattern - ant file-set pattern to scan for files to parse
        parser - the parser to apply on the found files
        moduleName - the name of the module to use for all files

      • FilesParser

        public FilesParser(String pluginId,
                   String filePattern,
                   AnnotationParser parser,
                   boolean shouldDetectModules,
                   boolean isMavenBuild)
        Creates a new instance of FilesParser.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the ID of the plug-in that uses this parser
        filePattern - ant file-set pattern to scan for files to parse
        parser - the parser to apply on the found files
        shouldDetectModules - determines whether modules should be detected from pom.xml or build.xml files
        isMavenBuild - determines whether this build uses maven

      • FilesParser

        public FilesParser(String pluginId,
                   String filePattern,
                   AnnotationParser parser,
                   boolean shouldDetectModules,
                   boolean isMavenBuild,
                   boolean canResolveRelativePaths)
        Creates a new instance of FilesParser.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the ID of the plug-in that uses this parser
        filePattern - ant file-set pattern to scan for files to parse
        parser - the parser to apply on the found files
        shouldDetectModules - determines whether modules should be detected from pom.xml or build.xml files
        isMavenBuild - determines whether this build uses maven
        canResolveRelativePaths - determines whether relative paths in warnings should be resolved using a time expensive operation that scans the whole workspace for matching files.

    • Method Detail

      • log

        protected void log(String message)
        Logs the specified message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message

      • plural

        protected String plural(int count,
                        String message)
        Creates a formatted message in singular or plural form.
        Parameters:
        count - the number of occurrences
        message - the message containing the format in singular form
        Returns:
        the message in singular or plural form depending on the count, or an empty string if the count is 0 and no format is specified
